name: radarec
description: RadaRec is a self-hosted recording manager for Radarr/Sonarr media downloads. It logs requests, tracks history, and manages recordings through a centralized interface.
features: Request logging: Track all movie and show requests sent to Radarr and Sonarr with timestamps and status.
Download history: View complete history of media acquisitions including quality, size, and source.
Centralized dashboard: Monitor multiple Radarr and Sonarr instances from a single interface.
Search tracking: Record what users searched for and whether content was found or requested.
Statistics reporting: Analyze download patterns, popular requests, and system performance over time.
User management: Track which users requested specific content for accountability and usage insights.
Failed download alerts: Get notified when downloads fail or require manual intervention.
Quality monitoring: Ensure downloaded content meets your quality standards and upgrade criteria.
API integration: Connect seamlessly to Radarr and Sonarr APIs for real-time data synchronization.
Custom filters: Search and filter recording history by date, user, quality, or status.
Export functionality: Download reports in CSV or JSON format for external analysis.
Retention management: Configure how long to keep historical records before automatic cleanup.
